text: Lyudmyla Oleksandrivna Yanukovych (; n√©e Nastenko; October 9, 1949) is a Ukrainian engineer. She is the ex-wife of fourth Ukrainian President Viktor Yanukovych. She was the First Lady of Ukraine between 2010 until 2014. She has worked at the Yenakiyeve Iron and Steel Works, in the design and appraisal bureau. After her divorce from Yanukovych, she moved to Crimea.Yanukovych said that he divorced wife, Ukrayinska Pravda (27 February 2017) ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Ukraine Category:Ukrainian engineers Category:People from Donetsk Oblast
title: Lyudmyla Yanukovych
